name: Autumn Rose Camisole
description:
The Autumn Rose print is lovingly placed on the front of the garment. Shoulder straps have been stitched with contrasting thread to match back to the autumnal shades in the print and are finished with vintage-inspired rings.

Autumn Rose camisole works perfectly layered under sheer tops or jackets, allowing the print to be seen by all. The camisole can also be teamed with beautiful Silk Tales French knickers in corsetry pink for a gorgeous sleep set or gift for someone special.

name: Ballerina Pleat Corset
description:
This gorgeous lightweight underwire corset has a modern bandeau style neckline. Foam padded bra cups give bust support to this strapless style, as does the light boning at the upper section of the side seams. The delicate stretch tulle is pleated in both front and back skirts.

This corset, teamed with the sexy Ballerina Pleat G-string, is perfect for wearing with jeans and jacket to a glamorous night out.

name: Winter Magnolia Camisole
description:
The Winter Magnolia camisole is made from the finest stretch silk; the elasticity within the fabric allows for a flexible and extremely comfortable fit. The garment features a stunning magnolia print on the front and back.

This camisole is perfect for wearing as special occasion sleepwear, or under a jacket with jeans as outerwear.

Team the Winter Magnolia camisole with matching Silk Tale Low Rise Knickers or Silk Tales French knickers in delicate Corsetry Pink or sexy Blue Steel colour.

name: Silk Tales camisole & French knickers sleep set
description:
Silk Tales camisole has tailored cups and a double-layer underband which contours gently under the bust line, providing light support. The camisole has fully adjustable straps and is made from stretch silk, allowing the garment to mould to the body, and providing the wearer with superb comfort and fit. The camisole is trimmed with vintage inspired buttons, rings and slides.

Camisole somes with gorgeous Silk Tales French knickers. All are available in delicate corsetry pink, sophisticated blue steel, sexy rouge and classic black colours.

name: Silk Tales Chemise
description:
Silk Tales chemise is one of our most popular garments. This style is made from stretch woven silk to enhance the comfort and fit for the wearer and is designed with a plunging V-neckline, scalloped under-band design detail and feminine frill sleeves. This design is further enhanced with vintage inspired button detail at side seam.

The chemise can be worn over a lovely pair of tights as a dress or as your favourite sleep attire.

Purchase this garment and spoil yourself!
